Title: Memory Fragment 5
Text: On the hundred and forty-fourth full moon of my knighthood, I was ordered to write a book on an islandâ€”despite my illiteracy. I wanted to share my techniques for fighting Tacet Discords, but the Acolytes suggested I center my words around the Five Knightly Virtues. O Sentinel, perhaps you can't hear this, but in all my supposed wisdom, I might be the most foolish of all.
